works.description:
Dear Sir/ Madam,

All software being published on our site http://wareseeker.com has been edited by our editor team. We are the owner of the copyrighted materials including the software description, screenshots and download links on WareSeeker.com.

It has come to our attention that downloadtarget. com has been crawling and scraping our entire database of software. We have identified thousands of pages on their site which display our copyrighted content.

We request Google to disable all access to the Infringing Material. Please inform us as soon as the access to the Infringement Materials is disabled. If this issue is not resolved in the next 7 working days, our legal representative will have to proceed to the next level.
